item.value:
Method invoked when the given thread terminates due to the * given uncaught exception. *

Any exception thrown by this method will be ignored by the * Java Virtual Machine. * @param t the thread * @param e the exception */

When init(true) combine with genResolvedParseTree, it will generate Resolved Parse tree from syntax tree //ReadEntity created under these conditions should be all relevant to the syntax tree even the ones without parents //set mergeIsDirect to true here
Implementation of the semantic analyzer. It generates the query plan. * There are other specific semantic analyzers for some hive operations such as * DDLSemanticAnalyzer for ddl operations.
cascade only occurs with partitioned table
Generate normalized name for a given target column.
A mapping from a tableName to a table object in metastore.
used to capture view to SQ conversions. This is used to check for * recursive CTE invocations
Keep track of view alias to view name and read entity
We have to materialize the table alias list since we might // modify it in the middle for view rewrite.
Go over the tables and populate the related structures
Go through each target column, generate the lineage edges
Dynamic partition keys should be added to field schemas
Based on the plan outputs, find out the target table name and column names

resultSchema will be null if // (1) cbo is disabled; // (2) or cbo is enabled with AST return path (whether succeeded or not, // resultSchema will be re-initialized) // It will only be not null if cbo is enabled with new return path and it // succeeds.
Check query results cache // In the case that row or column masking/filtering was required, we do not support caching. // TODO: Enable caching for queries with masking/filtering
Generate column access stats if required - wait until column pruning // takes place during optimization
Generate Parse Context for Optimizer & Physical compiler
Set the semijoin hints in parse context
Perform Logical optimization
if any filters are present in the join tree, push them on top of the // table
if there is only one destination in Query try to push where predicates * as Join conditions
initialize FetchTask right here
Recurse over all the source tables
Recurse over the subqueries to fill the subquery part of the plan
Some initial checks for a query to see if we can look this query up in the results cache.

If we use CBO and we may apply masking/filtering policies, we create a copy of the ast. // The reason is that the generation of the operator tree may modify the initial ast, // but if we need to parse for a second time, we would like to parse the unmodified ast

Check query results cache. // If no masking/filtering required, then we can check the cache now, before // generating the operator tree and going through CBO. // Otherwise we have to wait until after the masking/filtering step
replace each of the position alias in ORDERBY with the actual column name, // if cbo is enabled, orderby position will be processed in genPlan
Gen OP Tree from resolved Parse Tree
fetch all the hints in qb

If we use CBO and we may apply masking/filtering policies, we create a copy of the ast. // The reason is that the generation of the operator tree may modify the initial ast, // but if we need to parse for a second time, we would like to parse the unmodified ast.

Check query results cache. // If no masking/filtering required, then we can check the cache now, before // generating the operator tree and going through CBO. // Otherwise we have to wait until after the masking/filtering step.

Check the 1st-level children and do simple semantic checks: 1) CTLT and * CTAS should not coexists. 2) CTLT or CTAS should not coexists with column * list (target table schema). 3) CTAS does not support partitioning (for * now).
if it is not CTAS, we don't need to go further and just return
step processPositionAlias out of genResolvedParseTree
analyze and process the position alias
replace each of the position alias in GROUPBY with the actual column name
change the location of position alias process here
Generate Resolved Parse tree from syntax tree
put accessed columns to readEntity
Generate column access stats if required - wait until column pruning
set ColumnAccessInfo for view column authorization
Generate table access stats if required
Take care of view creation
Deduce Resultset Schema
gen Resolved Parse Tree
Resolved Parse Tree
analyze create table command
